name: stager
author: jm33-ng
comment: A Linux stager that supports payload delivery via HTTP with encryption and compression. Use with emp3r0r-listener

download_host.opt_desc: The host to download the payload from, eg. 192.168.0.1

download_port.opt_desc: The port to download the payload from, eg. 80

download_path.opt_desc: The path to download the payload from, eg. /payload

download_key.opt_desc: The key to decrypt the payload
